columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name of this OU.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) associated with this OU.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this OU.

columns.name: parent_id
columns.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the root or OU whose child OUs you want to list.

columns.name: path
columns.description: The OU path is a string representation that uniquely identifies the hierarchical location of an Organizational Unit within the AWS Organizations structure.
